attributes.review: I thought the app was going to enlighten me on his campaign points but instead it asked for my number and they might be using it for spam. Had to uninstall
attributes.title: Scam

attributes.review: This app gave me so many adds online relating to Trump. Before getting this app had had very few adds
attributes.title: No thank you

attributes.review: This app sent me inappropriate notifications everyday nonstop and wouldn’t stop promoting a racist orange pig. I’m not sure if the app has a glitch but all it does is provide false info and brainwash people. DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE SCAMMED AND HACKED!!!
attributes.title: Worst App Out There

attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately threw my phone😰 I saw an old pedo! An old pedo white supremacist! Can u believe it! Don’t get this app, unless ur prepared to give it a 1 star review 💫 Apple should delete this app🥰
attributes.title: Terrible✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I was told that when I download the app Trump would send 2$ to my cash app , I have never been more disappointed with an app in my life. 👁👄👁 (oops dropped my eye) 👋🏽👁
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: This app is terrible. Glitchy, shuts down. Never works and needs to be removed.
attributes.title: So many problems

attributes.review: This App is awful.  it keeps crashing and the content is all fake news and lies. Don’t waste your time downloading!!
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: WHEN I DOWNLOADED this app my phone was okay for a few hours but then my phone started getting crashed and i keep getting kick out i am very sad now
attributes.title: SO SAD :(

attributes.review: This app totally destroyed my phone and made it so other apps wouldn’t run and I couldn’t even use my phone i finally deleted the app now so gross🤮
attributes.title: Horrid

attributes.userName: hunny dont worry about my name
attributes.review: This app is very slow. If 0 stars was available I would definitely rate it 0. The app kept mentioning somebody named “Donald” ummm I’m not sure who that is but he seems very problematic! I’m uninstalling IMMEDIATELY! MANNY FOR PRESIDENT
